Boston.Izzy Ort's Bar & Grille:
Izzy Ort's Bar & Grille was a live music venue located at 25 Essex Street in Boston, Massachusetts


== History ==
Izzy Ort's was open from 1935 to 1969. Originally it featured jazz musicians. In 1953, the owner renamed it the Golden Nugget and switched to hillbilly music, and later, rock.
